description: Play - The DVD has eight live tracks recorded on Jools Holland's TV show in England and 10 videos of songs from Moby's album, Play. Five of the videos have never been released in America: "Find My Baby", "Porcelain UK", "Bodyrock ...
name: Moby: Play - The DVD

review.name: I have REALLY seen that movie and would like to comment on it
review.reviewBody:
I have REALLY seen that "movie" and would like to comment on it... First impression was: another one fake. Second (after exploring this site): where was video quality during its mastering (ain't that a fake?)

Honestly, "Live" subsection in main menu was rather good. I adore Moby for his music. Not for the "Plays" like that.

"Give an idiot a camcorder" as were announced... Really. CC in the hands of an idiot. 

Anyway - MOBY is MOBY, and now we can enjoy his music even with that shabbiness of video & audio quality.

And, of course, such gorgeous tracks like "Honey", "Why does my heart so bad", "Natural blues", "Porcelain"... This is Moby. Last and all the time!
